item.description:
Howdy! If you are looking for a different way to spend your Saturday evening come on out to the Midnight Rodeo Bar. So.....you've never had the chance to line dance? Come take Michelle's fun, easy lessons at 7:30.  SHANA STACK will be the band this Saturday.  If you are looking to meet new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there for a boot scoot'in good time!

FRIDAY JULY 15TH AND JULY 22ND ONLY
Midnight Rodeo Bar will be open !!-Mark your calendars and don't miss it!

Doors open at 7:00
Competition begins at 8:00

Four Country Artists will be competing in the Texaco Country Showdown competition. A National competition. NH's radio host is WCNL

If you missed the Battle of the Bands event that we hosted, here is your chance to come on out and see what a fun night it is !!
4 different country artist
Dancing / Drinking / Having a good time with great people !!
DJ Rich will be spinning the country tunes all night long !!

$10.00 cover charge
21 +
July 30, 2011- Don't forget to sign up for our 2 year anniversary workshop/barbeque/vip admission package. ($25) Limited spots will be sold. The Jonathan Scott Band will be performing. Also Hoofin it for Upreach (formerly the Longest Line Dance) tickets will be available ($10) !!
item.name: Midnight Rodeo Bar Meetup
